Translations.Text: wicked est tiel annihilated Lauxd est DI Lord univers
Dir Ki se DI sorb for your auxd your eyesight sigel your mens; which di DI restore these vi? Not kiel ni eksplik revelations not kiel ili ankoraux deviate
Dir Ki se di retribution ven vi suddenly post announcement gxi ne wicked who est incur annihilation
Ni ne send messengers deliverers bon news tro warners. Those kred reform hav nothing tim nor vol ili grieve
As por those reject our revelations ili incur retribution their wickedness
dir mi ne dir al vi ke mi posed trezor DI. Nor do mi kon future Nor do mi dir al vi mi est angxel. Mi simply sekv ki revealed me Dir est Est blind sam as seer? Vi ne reflect
Kaj predik this (Quran) al those reverence summoning their Lord - Ili hav neniom Him as Lord kaj Mastr nor intercessor! - Ke ili ating salvation
Ne dismiss those implore their Lord tag kaj nokt, devoting Him sol! Vi ne est responsible por their reckoning nor est ili responsible por your reckoning Vi dismiss them vi est transgressor
